verses.verse: Ye shall make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you no idols <S%H457><s%> nor graven image <S%H6459><s%>, neither rear you up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a standing image <S%H4676><s%>, neither shall ye set up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any image <S%H4906><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%>, to bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8692><s%> unto it: for I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and reverence <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
If ye walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them;

Then I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you rain <S%H1653><s%> in due season <S%H6256><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their fruit <S%H6529><s%>.

And your threshing <S%H1786><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto the vintage <S%H1210><s%>, and the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the sowing time <S%H2233><s%>: and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and ye shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and none shall make you afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: and I will rid <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, neither shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through your land <S%H776><s%>.
And ye shall chase <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And five <S%H2568><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and an hundred <S%H3967><s%> of you shall put ten thousand <S%H7233><s%> to flight <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

For I will have respect <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto you, and make you fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you, and establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> old store <S%H3462><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the old <S%H3465><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the new <S%H2319><s%>.
And I will set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not abhor <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you.

And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8694><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, and will be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>.

I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that ye should not be their bondmen <S%H5650><s%>; and I have broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of your yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and made you go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upright <S%H6968><s%>.
But if ye will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, and will not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all these Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>;

And if ye shall despise <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, or if your soul <S%H5315><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, so that ye will not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, but that ye break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>:

I also will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this unto you; I will even appoint <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8689><s%> over you terror <S%H928><s%>, consumption <S%H7829><s%>, and the burning ague <S%H6920><s%>, that shall consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and cause sorrow <S%H1727><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of heart <S%H5315><s%>: and ye shall sow <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>, for your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against you, and ye shall be slain <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8738><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: they that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you shall reign <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over you; and ye shall flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when none pursueth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you.

And if ye will not yet <S%H5704><s%> for all this hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, then I will punish <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8763><s%> you seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of your power <S%H5797><s%>; and I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your heaven <S%H8064><s%> as iron <S%H1270><s%>, and your earth <S%H776><s%> as brass <S%H5154><s%>:

And your strength <S%H3581><s%> shall be spent <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>: for your land <S%H776><s%> shall not yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, neither shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their fruits <S%H6529><s%>.

And if ye walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me, and will <S%H14><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto me; I will bring <S%H3254><s%> seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%> upon you according to your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

I will also send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8689><s%> wild <S%H7704><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> among you, which shall rob you of your children <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and destroy <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and make you few in number <S%H4591><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; and your high ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
And if ye will not be reformed <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8735><s%> by me by these things, but will walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me;

Then will I also walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you, and will punish <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you yet <S%H1571><s%> seven times <S%H7651><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you, that shall avenge <S%H5358><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the quarrel <S%H5359><s%> of my covenant <S%H1285><s%>: and when ye are gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%> within <S%H413><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%>, I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you; and ye shall be delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8738><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of your bread <S%H3899><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall bake <S%H644><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%>, and they shall deliver <S%H7725><s%> you your bread <S%H3899><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> by weight <S%H4948><s%>: and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and not be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And if ye will not for all this <S%H2063><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, but walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me;

Then I will walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you also in fury <S%H2534><s%>; and I, even <S%H637><s%> I, will chastise <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you seven times <S%H7651><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your high places <S%H1116><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your images <S%H2553><s%>, and cast <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your carcases <S%H6297><s%> upon the carcases <S%H6297><s%> of your idols <S%H1544><s%>, and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall abhor <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>, and bring <S%H8074><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> unto desolation <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and I will not smell <S%H7306><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the savour <S%H7381><s%> of your sweet odours <S%H5207><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H8074><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into desolation <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: and your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at it.

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8762><s%> you among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and will draw out <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you: and your land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>.

Then shall the land <S%H776><s%> enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, as long <S%H3117><s%> as it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8715><s%>, and ye be in your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ' land <S%H776><s%>; even then shall the land <S%H776><s%> rest <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

As long as <S%H3117><s%> it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8715><s%> it shall rest <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; because it did not rest <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in your sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, when ye dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon it.

And upon them that are left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> alive of you I will send <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a faintness <S%H4816><s%> into their hearts <S%H3824><s%> in the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a shaken <S%H5086><s%> <S%H8737><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall chase <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them; and they shall flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, as fleeing <S%H4499><s%> from a sword <S%H2719><s%>; and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when none pursueth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8804><s%> one <S%H376><s%> upon another <S%H251><s%>, as it were before <S%H6440><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%>, when none pursueth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and ye shall have no power to stand <S%H8617><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
And ye shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall eat you up <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And they that are left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of you shall pine away <S%H4743><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ' lands <S%H776><s%>; and also in the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall they pine away <S%H4743><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with them.

If they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8694><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, with their trespass <S%H4604><s%> which they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me, and that also they have walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me;

And that I also have walked <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto them, and have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; if then <S%H176><s%> their uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> hearts <S%H3824><s%> be humbled <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and they then accept <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>:

Then will I remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Avraham <S%H85><s%> will I remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

The land <S%H776><s%> also shall be left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of them, and shall enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, while she lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8715><s%> without them: and they shall accept <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: because <S%H3282><s%>, even because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and because their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>.

And yet <S%H637><s%> for all that <S%H2063><s%>, when they be <S%H1571><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, I will not cast them away <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, neither will I abhor <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, to destroy them utterly <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, and to break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them: for I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

But I will for their sakes remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of their ancestors <S%H7223><s%>, whom I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, that I might be their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> and Torahs <S%H8451><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> between him and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.
